trial_type.Description: The main category of the trial.

trial_type_id.Description: The binary category of the trial.

response_time.Description: Time from stimulus presentation to response.

response_accuracy.Description: Accuracy of the response with respect to the stimulus presented

bad_epoch.Description: Whether or not it was an epoch contaminated by artefacts

outliers.Description: Whether or not it was an outlier epoch

direction.Description: Angle of the direction of coherent motion

Levels.180: Dots move coherently to the left
Levels.0: Dots move coherently to the right or randomly

name_direction.Description: Name of the direction of coherent motion

Levels.LEFT: Dots move coherently to the left
Levels.RIGHT: Dots move coherently to the right

event_num.Description: Event number corresponding to the trial
